text: is a Japanese manga series by Yūji Aoki. It has been published in Weekly Morning since 1990. The series was given the 1992 Kodansha Manga Award for general manga. It also received the 1998 Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize Award for Excellence. == References == Category:1990 manga Category:2005 movies Category:2007 manga Category:2016 manga Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese television dramas based on manga Category:Manga series Category:Movies based on comics
title: Naniwa Kin'yūdō
